segments.text: Could you show me how to operate this fax machine ? I am going to receive some urgent fax from a company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . Let me check it . Firstly , don't be frustrated about all the buttons on it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: After overcoming these buttons , you should check whether there is any paper in the machine , you must make sure this .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And then prepare what you want to receive . If you want to send a photograph , you must copy one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The next thing you should do is to wait . The sender will give you the fax .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Look . Some of the faxes come through blurred . What is wrong with it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe we should call its after-service man .
segments.speaker: S2
